item.title: Forms Backend
item.description: You make the forms, we made the backend Don't worry about your forms, we cover it all without any coding required Add Forms, its free How it work Create Just give a name to your form and get the form URL Embed Add the form URL in the action attribute in any of your forms Get Notified On submittion, get notified by email or through our panel
